page.title: 02Farming and Stamford Bridge
page.content:
The land is used for growing wheat,barley,potatoes,peas,sugarbeet and oil seed rape.Some of the land is used for grass land.In the summer the grass is cut for hay.Most of the farm buildings are old but most barns are new.The farm machinery includes tractors,trailers,combines,ploughs, bailers,grass cutters,potato planters and seeders. On crop farms the farmer needs more machinery than on animal farms.Some farmers have hilly farms,but some have flat land.The name of my farm is Town End Farm.It is very old. On the animal farms are cows,hens,pigs,sheep,horses,goats and bulls.There are a lot of land farmers but not so many animal farms.
Suzanne Smith
